definition: to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)
curtain or screen/canopy or tent/headquarters of a general/act (of a play)

pinyin: ping2 mu4 bao3 hu4 cheng2 xu4

sentences.english: They spend long hours staring at the screen with few breaks.
sentences.chinese: 他們長時間地注視屏幕，幾乎不休息。

sentences.english: LCD screen display, man-machine dialogue, graphic display interface.
sentences.chinese: 液晶屏幕顯示，人機對話，圖形顯示界面。

sentences.english: They become too attached to the computer screen. It isn't healthy.
sentences.chinese: 他們變得太黏在計算機屏幕前，這很不健康。

sentences.english: You can choose the mode from the Oculus Configuration Utility's Rift Display Mode screen.
sentences.chinese: 你可以選擇應用程序的屏幕顯示模式。

sentences.english: If the aperture is circular , a circular spot of light appears on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 如果孔是圓形的，那麼在屏幕上出現一圓形光斑。

sentences.english: There should be one target, whereas two targets are indicated in the radar screen.
sentences.chinese: 本應該是一條船，在雷達屏幕上卻顯示兩條船。

sentences.english: If you look at this screen, there is a play button.
sentences.chinese: 如果你看到這這個屏幕，你將會發現一個播放按鈕。

sentences.english: The advantage of Microsoft's method is that it works better for on-screen reading.
sentences.chinese: 微軟的做法的好處在於它更利於屏幕閱讀。

sentences.english: Here you should slide the screen area bar to the left.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，您應該幻燈片屏幕面積大律師公會到左邊。

sentences.english: Create a scrapbook of photos on your homescreen.
sentences.chinese: 可在你家裏的屏幕上創建一張照片剪貼簿。

sentences.english: After optimization your pages will appear to snap onto the screen.
sentences.chinese: 在優化之後，你的頁面會快速的呈現在屏幕上。

sentences.english: Also, screens nearly always have a bevelled edge.
sentences.chinese: 此外，屏幕幾乎總是有一個斜面的邊緣。

sentences.english: Chinese technicians closely watched the computer screens monitoring each step in the production processes.
sentences.chinese: 中國的技師正看着電腦屏幕檢測着每一個生產細節。

sentences.english: Around 50 of his images were presented on a giant screen. And the critics lapped them up.
sentences.chinese: 大概有50張左右的圖片被展示在巨大的屏幕上。

sentences.english: Design games to work well across multiple screen sizes.
sentences.chinese: 設計能夠跨多樣式屏幕運行的遊戲。

sentences.english: The input clear text is not visible on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 輸入的明碼文本在屏幕上是不可見的。

definition: to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)
inch (unit of length equal to 2.54 cm.)
button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
